name: Fate Of Freedom - Melon Run: A Running Game About Freedom
name_original: Fate Of Freedom - Melon Run: A Running Game About Freedom
description:
“I am small but not my dreams” - Little Melon

Join the battle with Melons to get “Freedom of Life” from tyrant Cleavers, in this uniquely tuned Running game.


*** Incredible Graphics & Sound ***

- Enjoy Real Time Water Reflection.
- Stunning Environment of Vivid Colors & Effects
- Soulful & Inspiring Music.

*** Powers you haven’t seen before in any Running game ***

- Slow down Time, to sneak from Obstacles
- Acquire the power of Blackhole to become invincible.
- Use Mega Jump, to leap great distance over your enemies.


*** Bonus Collections Levels ***

Experience “White Truth” and “Dark Lie”. Take as many Gems as you could.


*** GameCenter Leaderboards And Facebook Social ***

- GameCenter Leaderboards integrated. Now challenge your friends or World to do the High Scores.
- Share Score to Facebook. Acquire more competition.


*** Freedom Quotes ***

Never wastes your time upon Pause or Game Over. Read some Freedom Quotes.

*** Yeah! This Run will be having an End ***

You don’t need to run aimlessly till the end of time. It does has an End.
Stay tuned for this. Know what will be the “Fate Of Freedom”. ;)


We love feedback and suggestions,
Please report Bugs and Suggestions via support@hybriona.com to make this App better. ;)
